name: S.S.C: Rusted War - DEMO
description:
The town of Havenport is home to two rivaling gangs known as the S.S.C. and Eclipse. Seemingly at the brink of war, Havenport calls in an elite commander from another district to uncover Eclipse's upcoming plans and put a stop to them before it's too late.

THIS GAME IS CURRENTLY AVAILABLE AS A DEMO AT THIS TIME. PLEASE REPORT BUGS OR STRANGE OCCURRENCES.  

The game is currently without background music in the overworld and the mini-games have yet to be implemented. Keep an eye out for future versions.
